description:
A collection of utilities bringing back classic features to Windows.


What's Changed
- Fix modern settings on Win11 24H2+ by @ge0rdi in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/2091
- Fix custom button with auto-hiding taskbar (#2067)
- Apply taskbar customizations to News and interests (#676)
- Update StartMenuL10N.ini for all languages by @Need74 in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/2086
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/compare/v4.4.194...v4.4.195
